pageTitle: Central line closure due to White City development works

title.title: Central line closure due to White City development works

texts: Due to engineering works as part of the White City development, the Central line will be suspended between North Acton and Marble Arch on Sunday 12 June.
A special shuttle train service will operate from North Acton to Ealing Broadway and West Ruislip.
Two rail replacement bus services will operate:

Service A
Between North Acton and Willesden Junction

Service B
Between North Acton and Shepherd's Bush
Passengers travelling from west London to central London should use the Rail Replacement Bus Service A and the Bakerloo line between Willesden Junction and Oxford Circus.
Passengers travelling from central London to North Acton and beyond are advised to take the Central line to Oxford Circus and change for the Bakerloo line and the Rail Replacement Bus Service A.
Alternatively, passengers may wish to use the following services where valid London Underground tickets will be accepted:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003eWest Ruislip\u003c/strong\u003e Chiltern Line services to/from Paddington\u003cbr /\u003eMetropolitan Line services to/from Ickenham or Ruislip","\u003cstrong\u003eRuislip Gardens\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eMetropolitan Line services to/from Ruislip or Ruislip Manor","\u003cstrong\u003eHanger Lane\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003ePiccadilly Line services to/from Park Royal","\u003cstrong\u003eEaling Broadway\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eDistrict Line services to Hammersmith and Earl's Court","\u003cstrong\u003eWest Acton\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003ePiccadilly Line services to/from North Ealing","\u003cstrong\u003eShepherd's Bush\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eHammersmith \u0026 City Line services","\u003cstrong\u003eNotting Hill Gate\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eDistrict Line services","\u003cstrong\u003eQueensway\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eDistrict Line services to/from Bayswater"]}

Passengers are advised to allow an extra half hour to complete their journeys, especially those travelling from stations west of Marble Arch into central London and wishing to make last train connections.
Please note that due to engineering work, there is no Circle line or District line service between Earl's Court and Whitechapel stations.
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Ealing Broadway and High Street Kensington","Richmond and High Street Kensington","Wimbledon and Edgware Road"]}
For 24-hour information on all London travel, please call: 020 7222 1234 or visit TfL's website .
